Accommodation Waikiki Beach Marriott Resort & Spa (4 stars) Located in the heart of Waikiki Beach next to Diamond Head, this Honolulu resort is highlighted by the all new Queensbreak amenity deck, Waikiki’s largest outdoor entertainment space featuring two pools, restaurant and bar floating among palm trees overlooking Queens, the most famous surf break on Waikiki. Take in soothing ocean breezes from the private lanai of your hotel room or suite, complete with island-style décor and indulgent bedding. The resort offers a diverse selection of award-winning restaurants, serving everything from local dishes to dry-aged steaks. Embassy Suites by Hilton Waikiki Beach Walk (4 stars) Embassy Suites by Hilton Waikiki Beach Walk is perfect for family vacations, romantic escapes or group retreats in the paradise of Oahu. The hotel is only steps from the beach and the best local attractions including Diamond Head and Waikiki Aquarium. Soak in the Aloha spirit and Hawaiian hospitality in a modern, upscale setting with beautifully decorated one and two-bedroom suites. Facilities include a heated outdoor pool, whirlpool spa, a children's pool, and a sundeck with lounge chairs, daybeds, and private cabanas. Rise and shine to a delicious breakfast, explore Waiki Beach Walk and and end the day at the nightly poolside reception offering complimentary drinks and light refreshments for the entire family.
